item.title: BlockGiving- A decentralized giving network
item.description: Colony Hackathon Submission A decentalized, self-perpuating, cross-border giving network on top of COLONY Project Description This project now lives at Github Goal: To create a self-perpetuating, decentralized, cross-borders, Giving Platform.
